name: Charutar Arogya Mandal

address: Charutar Arogya Mandal, Shree Krishna Hopsital, Fund Raising Department

briefDescription: Shree Krishna Hospital managed by Charutar Arogya Mandal, is an 800-bed teaching hospital located in Karamsad, the birthplace of Sardar Vallabh bhai Patel, Gujarat. The NABH accredited multi-speciality Hospital, with its modern facilities and professional services, serves the community and lives up to the credo, "Solace for the Suffering", envisioned by its founder Chairman.  In 2016-17, the hospital served around 4,00,000 out-patients and over 37,000 in-patients, most of them from poor and less privileged rural families. The annual burden to the Hospital due to concessions and free-ships given to patients amounts to more than Rs. 20 crores annually.With regard to credibility & transparency, in addition to the Platinum seal of GuideStar India, the Mandal is accredited by Credibility Alliance, BSE Samman and enlisted with Charity Aid Foundation, TISS CSR Hub, to name a few organizations.Donation cheques to the Mandal should be in favour of 'Charutar Arogya Mandal' and are eligible for tax exemption under Section 80 G of the IT Act. Individual donors could also donate through PayTM using online modes of fund transfer.
